description: Very good. I like very much.
Imposed use by most of the websites but it works well. But keep it the most updated possible.
Not a perfect app but still need everywhere.
I'd rather do without but I'm addicted to streaming.
summary: Bloated and a hole in your system

description: Have you heard the expression a necessary evil?

Flash is barely used anywhere anymore. I block all Flash and have a second extensions to create fake "fingerprints" because the minute off turn off the Flash blocker and click that video, I get notified about the canvas fingerprint tracking that just began. Luckily my extensions handle MOST of these little tricks for me automatically now, but I seriouslly use about 18 privacy and security extensions on top of the VPN and other precautions.
summary: Need to use Flash?! Maybe once a month and I'm onlline ALL THE TIME

description: Flash is honestly not the most secure or free (as in freedom) project out there, but it does what it says on the tin, and does it rather well.
This is a great programme, I don't know why Linux doesn't like it. I agree with Frederic Farfart Kacprzyk. Keep it as updated as possible.
Une application vraiment insupportable sur Linux.
